attributes.action: To get the council to control dog fouling
attributes.background: To start campaign to get the council to do something about dog fouling all over uk

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you're concerned about dog fouling in your local area, you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
